sqlMap.sql: FROM t_fg_stock f INNER JOIN v_cust_fg_part v ON f.fgid = v.fgid WHERE v.part_isenable = 1 AND v.fg_isenable = 1 v.customerid = #customerId# v.fgname LIKE #fgName# + '%' v.fgno LIKE #fgNo# + '%' f.reportdate >= #reportDateFr# f.reportdate <= #reportDateTo#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DISTINCT v.fgId ,v.customerId ,v.customerCode ,v.customerName ,v.fgName ,v.fgNo ,v.partId
ORDER BY v.customerCode, v.fgNo
SELECT TOP 1 fgBalance , fgAdjust FROM t_fg_stock WHERE fgid = #fgId# AND reportdate < #reportDateFr# customerid = #customerId# ORDER BY fgid, reportDate DESC

SELECT TOP 1 ISNULL(o.balanceorderqty, d.balanceOrderQty) AS balanceOrderQty FROM t_deliveryplan_date d LEFT JOIN t_deliveryplan_date_0 o ON o.deliveryPlanId = ( SELECT TOP 1 p.deliveryplanid FROM t_deliveryplan p WHERE customerId = #customerId# AND yearmonth = ( CAST(CONVERT(INT, DATEPART(year, #reportDateFr#)) AS VARCHAR(4)) + RIGHT('0' + (CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), LTRIM(STR(DATEPART(month, #reportDateFr#))))), 2) ) ORDER BY yearmonth DESC, revision DESC ) AND o.fgid = #fgId# WHERE d.fgid = #fgId# AND d.deliveryplanid = ( SELECT TOP 1 p.deliveryplanid FROM t_deliveryplan p WHERE customerId = #customerId# AND yearmonth < ( CAST(CONVERT(INT, DATEPART(year, #reportDateFr#)) AS VARCHAR(4)) + RIGHT('0' + (CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), LTRIM(STR(DATEPART(month, #reportDateFr#))))), 2) ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.t_deliveryplan_date d WHERE d.fgid = #fgId# AND p.deliveryplanid = d.deliveryplanid ) ORDER BY yearmonth DESC, revision DESC ) ORDER BY d.deliveryDate DESC
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM t_fg_stock WHERE fgid = #fgId# AND reportdate = #reportDate# reportdate >= #reportDateFr# reportdate <= #reportDateTo#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT TOP $maxRecord$ sCustomerId AS customerId ,sCustomerCode AS customerCode ,sPartId AS partId ,sPartNo AS partNo ,sPartName AS partName ,sMaterial AS material ,sCategory AS category ,nUnitWeight AS unitWeight ,nUnitPrice AS saleUnitPrice ,nCurrency AS currency ,WIP_nQty AS wipQty ,WIP_nValue AS wipValue ,FG_nQty AS fgQty ,FG_nValue AS fgValue ,nTotalStockValue AS totalStock ,dReportdate AS reportDate FROM V_17_ProductCheckStockList
sCustomerId = #customerId# sPartNo LIKE #partNo# +'%' sPartname LIKE #partName# +'%' CONVERT(DATE,dReportdate,103) >= CONVERT(DATE,#dateFrom#,120) CONVERT(DATE,dReportdate,103) <= CONVERT(DATE,#dateTo#,120)
ORDER BY sPartNo

SELECT CAST(CONVERT(DATE,p.dReportdate,103) AS VARCHAR) + ':' + CAST(d.sPartId AS VARCHAR)+ ':' + d.sWIP AS idRef ,d.nCurrentStock_WIP AS stockWIP FROM V_17_ProductCheckStockList p LEFT JOIN V_17_ProductCheckStockList_WIPStock d ON d.nYearMonth = p.dReportdate AND d.sPartId = p.sPartId
p.sCustomerId = #customerId# p.sPartNo LIKE #partNo# +'%' p.sPartname LIKE #partName# +'%' CONVERT(DATE,p.dReportdate,103) >= CONVERT(DATE,#dateFrom#,120) CONVERT(DATE,p.dReportdate,103) <= CONVERT(DATE,#dateTo#,120)
